content: Would you be so kind as to do me a (___) and lend me your car for the weekend?
The company decided to expand its operations in the region due to the (___) business environment, including low taxes and supportive government policies.
Despite facing tough competition, our product was (___) reviewed by industry experts, solidifying our position in the market.
Can you do me a (___)?
The weather is (___) for outdoor activities.
The company had a (___) financial year with increased profits.
The candidate was received (___) by the audiences.
Despite facing numerous setbacks and challenges, she continued to (___) in herself and her abilities to overcome any obstacles in her path.
The special effects in the new movie are (___)– the explosions and fight scenes look so realistic that you won’t think they are fabricated.

(___) speaking, the prices of organic produce at the farmer's market are higher than those at the supermarket, but the quality and nutritional value make it a worthwhile investment for health-conscious consumers.
The elaborate birthday party organized by her friends was a delightful (___) that left her speechless and filled with joy.
Police said the thieves were obviously well (___) with the alarm system at the department store.
The documentary shed light on the (___) reality of child labor in developing countries, prompting viewers to take action and advocate for change.
The rise of generative AI has (___) the authenticity of digital content, as it becomes increasingly challenging to distinguish between real and artificially generated images, videos, and text.
Indulging in a warm cup of hot chocolate on a chilly winter evening can (___) both your taste buds and your soul.
The customer expressed a high level of (___) with the quality of the product and the helpful service provided by the staff.
After years of hard work and dedication, she finally (___) her dream of becoming a published author.
The team is working diligently to (___) a user-friendly interface for the new application, ensuring a seamless experience for the end-users.
The architect proposed a (___) to the building's layout, aiming to optimize the use of space and enhance functionality.
The invention of the internet (___) the way people communicate and access information, transforming various aspects of daily life.
The young musician struggled with his drug (___). He has been in and out of rehab for years.
The partnership between the two companies proved to be mutually (___), as they both gained increased market share and access to new customer segments.
Doing moderate exercise is (___) for decreasing stress among students, especially during periods when they are applying for university admission.
The company's quarterly profits (___) expectations, demonstrating its strong performance in the market.
His (___) spending on luxury items left him in significant debt and financial hardship.
(___) sugar is stored as fat.
Her (___) spending on clothes and accessories was getting out of control.
